reason: Update the navbar branding to replace Kaiser Permanente with CareLoop logo and title
description: Modifies the topbar section of index.html to replace the existing Kaiser Permanente logo (KP) and title with a new CareLoop logo (CL) and title. Updates the logo-mark text content, logo-title text, and page title. Maintains existing CSS styling and layout structure while changing only the branding elements.

context_urls.purpose: MDN documentation for semantic HTML nav element structure and accessibility
Flexbox patterns for navbar layout and alignment of logo elements
Best practices for semantic HTML structure in navigation components
